dir.create("images")
#function to rotate cc
trans.img <- function(img=NULL,out.dir=NULL){
  i<- EBImage::readImage(img)
  it <- EBImage::transpose(i)
  EBImage::writeImage(it,files = paste0(out.dir,"/",basename(img)))
}
